trans-unit.source: Allows security actions for <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaborationPermission"></xref> to be applied to code using declarative security.
trans-unit.target: Tillater Sikkerhetshandlinger for <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaborationPermission"> </xref> som skal brukes til å bruke deklarerende sikkerhet-kode.

trans-unit.source: The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction> that is used.
trans-unit.target: Avhengig av omfanget deklarasjonen som er tillatt i <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>som brukes.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>

trans-unit.source: The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time.
trans-unit.target: Sikkerhetsinformasjonen deklarert av et sikkerhetsattributt med er lagret i metadataene for attributtet, og brukes under kjøring av systemet.

trans-unit.source: Security attributes are used only for declarative security.
trans-unit.target: Av sikkerhetsattributter brukes bare for deklarerende sikkerhet.

trans-unit.source: For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class.
trans-unit.target: For viktig sikkerhet, kan du bruke den tilsvarende tillatelse-klassen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaborationPermissionAttribute"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaborationPermissionAttribute"> </xref> klassen med den angitte <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaborationPermissionAttribute> works with <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaborationPermission> to allow or deny a peer access to the collaboration session.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaborationPermissionAttribute>fungerer med <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaborationPermission>å gi eller avslå en node-tilgang til samarbeidsøkten.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaborationPermission></xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaborationPermissionAttribute>
Oppretter og returnerer en ny <xref href="System.Security.IPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is not called, and is included only to support inheritance from <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles ikke, og blir inkludert bare for å støtte arving av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAttribute>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAttribute>
